channel.title: Too many Player Lagg
channel.description: how can i stop it so that when there is over like 50 players on my server it won't lagg? it's 508.

@sonicforce41 wrote:

well it’s a 508 not 317. any tips for 508?

item.title: Too many Player Lagg
item.dc:creator: @daved daved
item.description:
@daved wrote:

Get rid of the unused npcs, get rid of the unused gameobjects.

Try to make the things simpler, get rid of the unused drops. prevent the people to drop things at home. Hire more moderators to bann the spammers, check for glitches around your server.

Auto restart the server every hour, check your internet connection, ::npcreset often.

also you can try adding some antilaggs, I’m sure there are a lot on this site. GG on your server population.

Read full topic
